310d56d35246cdaea4e80a91a2fcb4f8: Finally change the settings. For random maps this includes the number of players, the size of a map, etc. For scenarios you can only select who controls which player (decides where you start on the map etc.). The options are either a human player, an AI or no player at all (the opponent will just be idle).
35f860b776aa590a74db1418b91ba999: To set up a multiplayer game, one player must select the “Host game” option. The game uses UDP port 20595, so the host must configure their NAT/firewall/etc. to allow this. Other players can then select “Join game” and enter the host's IP address.

9ceb816b810209b8e7bc153dd1d55e90: Thank you for installing 0 A.D.! This page will give a brief overview of the features available in this incomplete, under-development, alpha version of the game.
9e64f2518fead6af06ea4d175a48b027: Alt + Triple Left Click \\[on unit] – Select all your units of the same kind and rank on the entire map
a2f2f3b318280499d9dcfb8080b28438: hotkey.lobby – Show the multiplayer lobby in a dialog window
a507a38c8ea466e8ace73465527f0549: The controls and gameplay should be familiar to players of traditional real-time strategy (RTS) games. There are currently a lot of missing features and poorly-balanced stats – you will probably have to wait until a beta release for it to work well.
a605c30f5509eaed6075c89c85d5b7d5: You may change hotkeys in [font=\"sans-bold-14\"]Options > Hotkeys[font=\"sans-14\"] to suit your liking.
ad02780a1c89511002210294d79de76b: • Arrow keys or WASD keys to move the camera

c18c065a0d03029d3490f4815d3f7d3c: • [font=\"sans-bold-14\"]Single-player[font=\"sans-14\"] – Play a sandbox game or against one or more computer players (AI). The default AI (Petra) is under development and may not always be up to date on the new features, but you can play the game with or against it nonetheless.

f16fadb3dc4627b57c451ddea71b7366: Then the maps can be further filtered. The default maps are generally playable maps. Naval maps are maps where not all opponents can be reached over land and demo maps are maps used for testing purposes (generally not useful to play on). The “All Maps” filter shows all maps together in one list.
f4ba67b9340d3f6e8251717cb6963ea9: hotkey.bigscreenshot – Take huge screenshot (6400×4800 pixels, in .bmp format, location is displayed in the top left of the GUI after the file has been saved, and can also be seen in the console/logs if you miss it there)
